text: Edgardo Maerina (born 31 March 1964) is a Filipino rower. He competed in the men's single sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. He later served as head coach of the Philippine national rowing team as part of the Philippine Rowing Association. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Philippines Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Rowers at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for the Philippines
title: Edgardo Maerina
